analysis.description:
ECH.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xf4f8ab8c5db70c8aa8fe22fd8a86505125ef2b3e.sol#60-61)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xf4f8ab8c5db70c8aa8fe22fd8a86505125ef2b3e.sol#33)
